SELECT ri.id, ri.repair_code, ri.staff_id, ri.repair_status, ri.remark, ri.create_date, oi.order_name, si.NAME AS staffName, pi1.NAME AS productName, pi1.`type` AS productType, pi1.images FROM repair_info ri LEFT JOIN staff_info si ON ( si.id = ri.staff_id ) LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( oi.repair_code = ri.repair_code ) LEFT JOIN product_info pi1 ( pi1.id = oi.product_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ri.repair_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{repairInfo.repairCode},'%')
AND ri.repair_status = #{repairInfo.repairStatus}
AND oi.order_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{repairInfo.orderName},'%')
AND si.order_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{repairInfo.staffName},'%')
ORDER BY ri.create_date DESC
